None.Name: Ice Bolt
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, tower hurls an ice bolt that deals 110 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 170 in total.

None.Name: Gift of Ice
None.Description: Friendly entities in a 25m radius take 50% less damage for 30 seconds or until a total of 5200 damage has been absorbed.
